                                                                                                                                                                                                         Plense turn Sver




Now.                                                                                                                                                           If you want to see your capital grow, and want to
                                                                                                                                                          know precisely how much it will grow, National
                                                                                                                                                          Savings Capital Bonds are ju st what you’ve been
                                                                                                                                                          looking for.
After five yearsi                                                                                                                                              Capital Bonds are designed for totally risk-free
guaranteed!                                                                                                                                               capital growth by way of accumulated interest. They
                                                                                                                                                          offer a cast-iron guarantee of an average retu rn of 12 %
                                                                                                                                                          pa gross if held for a full five years, whatever happens
                                                                                                                                                          to other interest rates.
                                                                                                                                                                Benefits for both taxpayers and
                                                                                                                                                                non-taxpayers
                                                                                                                                                               Anyone who buys Capital Bonds will benefit from
                                                                                                                                                          totally secure growth at guaranteed rates. T he interest
                                                                                                                                                          on Capital Bonds is taxable annually. But if you arc a
                                                                                                                                                          non-taxpayer, you simply keep the full 12%. Because
                                                                                                                                                          — unlike local banks or building societies — National
                                                                                                                                                          Savings don’t have to take tax off your interest.
                                                                                                                                                               If you are a basic rate taxpayer your return over a
                                                                                                                                                          full five years would average out at 9% pa after tax.
                                                                                                                                                          And if you are in paid employment, you’ll probably be
                                                                                                                                                          able to pay the Incom e Tax which is due each year by
                                                                                                                                                          deduction from your monthly salary through PAYE.
                                                                                                                                                               How to buy Capital Bonds
                                                                                                                                                               Capital Bonds are for lum p sums. You buy them
                                                                                                                                                          in multiples o f £100, and the minimum purchase is
                                                                                                                                                          £100. T h ere’s absolutely no top limit.
                                                                                                                                                               When you’ve bought them , you just sit back in the
                                                                                                                                                          certain knowledge that your capital will accumulatc at
                                                                                                                                                          a guaranteed rate, year on year, for a full five years.
                                                                                                                                                          No ifs. No buts.
                                                                                                                                                               Don’t miss out on Capital Bonds. Ask for the
                                                                                                                                                          prospectus and purchase form at your post office. Or,
                                                                                                                                                          if you’d like m ore information, ring 0253 79 3090
                                                                                                                                                          during officc hours.
